title: Alitas de Pollo Empanizadas Taqueritos Toreado y Queso Fusión
instructions: Step 1. Mix the spices (salt, pepper, ajo and comino after seasoning the chicken wings).
Step 2. Let the chicken wings rest for half an hour.
Step 3. Grind the two types of Taqueritos in a food processor and mix in a bowl.
Step 4. Pass the chicken wings through flour, egg, and finally the Taqueritos.
Step 5. Heat the oil and fry the chicken.
Step 6. Serve the chicken in a plate and accompany with sauces.
